tool_description: FactCheXcker CarinaNet is an AI-powered tool for automatic detection and localization of carina and endotracheal tube (ETT) positioning in chest X-rays. Part of the FactCheXcker framework designed to mitigate measurement hallucinations in radiology reports. The tool provides precise localization of ETT tips and carina with distance measurements for clinical positioning verification.
tool_author: Alice Heiman, Xiaoman Zhang, Emma Chen, Sung Eun Kim, Pranav Rajpurkar
demo_commands: python -c "import carinanet; model = carinanet.CarinaNetModel() results = model.detect('/Users/zxm/Desktop/2025_FLARE/xray/data/xray.jpg'); print(f'ETT detected: {results[\"ett_detected\"]}, Distance: {results[\"distance\"]:.2f}mm')"

python -c "import carinanet; import cv2; model = carinanet.CarinaNetModel() image = cv2.imread('/Users/zxm/Desktop/2025_FLARE/xray/data/xray.jpg', cv2.IMREAD_GRAYSCALE); analysis = model.analyze_positioning(image); print(f'Status: {analysis[\"status\"]}, Distance: {analysis[\"distance_mm\"]:.1f}mm')"

python -c "import carinanet; model = carinanet.CarinaNetModel() results = model.detect_with_visualization('/Users/zxm/Desktop/2025_FLARE/xray/data/xray.jpg'); model.save_annotated_image(results, 'ett_carina_detection.png')"

python -c "import carinanet; model = carinanet.CarinaNetModel() report = model.generate_clinical_report('/Users/zxm/Desktop/2025_FLARE/xray/data/xray.jpg'); print(f'Position Assessment: {report[\"position_assessment\"]}')"

image_path.description: Path to the input chest X-ray image file (DICOM, PNG, JPEG, or TIFF format).

output_dir.description: Directory path where the detection results and visualizations will be saved.

save_visualization.description: Generate and save annotated visualization with bounding boxes.

clinical_report.description: Generate structured clinical report with positioning assessment.

ett_detected.description: Whether endotracheal tube is detected in the image.

carina_detected.description: Whether carina (tracheal bifurcation) is detected in the image.

ett_bbox.description: Bounding box coordinates for ETT [x, y, width, height].

carina_bbox.description: Bounding box coordinates for carina [x, y, width, height].

distance_mm.description: Distance between ETT tip and carina in millimeters.

ett_confidence.description: Detection confidence score for ETT (0.0 to 1.0).

carina_confidence.description: Detection confidence score for carina (0.0 to 1.0).

measurement_confidence.description: Confidence score for distance measurement (0.0 to 1.0).

clinical_recommendations.description: List of clinical recommendations based on positioning assessment.

visualization_path.description: Path to saved annotated visualization image, if generated.

clinical_significance.Correct: ETT positioned 5Â±2 cm above carina - optimal positioning
clinical_significance.Too High: ETT too far from carina - risk of accidental extubation
clinical_significance.Too Low: ETT too close to carina - risk of endobronchial intubation
clinical_significance.Uncertain: Insufficient image quality or unclear anatomical landmarks
